CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 14, 1958, pg. B6, reads: "HUSBAND AND WIFE - Waverly Burnard Clanton Jr., left, and Carrie Alston Clanton, husband and wife, marched down the aisle together at Pitt's graduation to receive Bachelor of Arts Degrees"
TitMainTitle: Waverly Burnard Clanton Jr. and Carrie Alson Clanton wearing dark caps and gowns, after receiving Bachelor of Arts Degrees, at University of Pittsburgh graduation
